message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own a unique item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.

I understand you think it's pricey, but I've done some research and I'm confident that this product is worth more than that. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $95 for the product.

I understand you're trying to stay within your budget, but I'm still not willing to go below $105. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make a decent profit. I'm now offering it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to pay $100 for the product.
